ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from changing the related product if order has already been sent to JDE. This rule applies for Perso and e-Co orders
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($User.BypassVR__c), ISPICKVAL(SPO_FirmOrderStatus__c, 'Production in progress'), ISPICKVAL( SPO_TechETLStatus__c , 'Y'), OR( ISPICKVAL(SPO_BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c, 'PERSO'), ISPICKVAL(SPO_BriefName__r.ApplicationSource__c, 'ECO') ), ISCHANGED(ProductCatalogue__c)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The order has already been sent to JDE. You can no longer change the related product.
